data.actual_result: The emoji and all the text after it until a new formatting mark will not be rendered
data.expected_result: The emoji is shown as a part of the sentence
data.short_description: backslash-escaped emojis break rendering of text
data.steps_to_repro: - Have someone post an emoji prefixed by a backslash in a sentence - View it from the iOS app - This might cause it right here, \🍩 this text will probably not be shown on an iOS device.
